I have developed a special chipset which improves the efficiency of machines.
This chipset is most useful in energy generators, where it controls the generation and transformation of energy. This increases energy production per tick or the profit from resources.
A industrial chipset of high quality (high chip power) or the usage of multiple chipsets will increase the effect accordingly.
Hint: The exact effect is determined by the supporting machine.
Hint: Refer to "Logic Chipset" for general information.
